post.author: 배길상
post.content:
Procom 에서 아래와 같이 Sr .Net Developer 를 찾고 있습니다. 관심 있으신분들은 Apply 하세요.

We are searching for a seasoned .Net Developer to work for a major financial institution on a permanent basis. This opportunity is based in Kitchener/Waterloo and a full job description is below.

If you or anyone you know is interested please let me know as soon as possible.
Best Regards,
James Campbell
JamesC@procom.ca

-=JOB OPPORTUNITY=-

Position: Software Developer- C#/VB/ASP.Net

Mandatory Skills:
-5+ Years previous demonstrated design/development experience in the following technologies; Crystal Enterprise, Crystal Reports or other reporting tools, PowerCenter or similar ETL tools, Microsoft .Net (VB.NET, ASP, C#) , Mainframe JCL

-Proven development/analyst skills preferably with a degree in Computer Science, related technology degree/diploma, or equivalent experience.
-Demonstrates problem solving skills with ability to analyze situations/problems systematically and deliver effective right-sized solutions in a timely manner.
-Proven technical lead capabilities, able to co-ordinate work tasks for other developers.
-Ability to work independently as well as being a strong team player with the ability to work effectively in a multi-site environment.
-Experience with integrating vendor packages into an established production environment consisting on various technologies and platforms.
-Strong working background with client-server environments and exposure to web based applications.
-Excellent organizational skills with the ability to handle several tasks efficiently.
-Excellent verbal and written communications skills.
-Experience with relational databases (SQL Server) and stored procedures.
-Experience with System Development Life Cycle Methodologies

Nice-to-Have Skills:
-Background of Change Management process, GCC requirements
-Knowledge of source code management (PVCS Dimensions)
-Understanding of web application development

Location: Kitchener/Waterloo (Ontario, Canada)
Duration: Permanent, Full Time
Rate/Salary: Negotiable
Start Date: Immediate

Job Description: On behalf our large, financial services client, an Employer of Choice, Procom KW is searching for a software developer with strong mix of .Net development experience.
post.title: Sr .Net Developer
